content:
748 
 
 
    (xxxvii) BABCOCK - 'O' level credit pass in Economics may be 
considered provided the candidate has a 'O' level credit 
pass in Accounting or Commerce.  
(xxxviii) UMUDIKE requires two (2) other 'O' level credit passes 
from Government, Christian Religious Studies and 
Geography.  
(xxxix) OOU requires 'O' level credit passes in any three (3) of 
Accounting, Business Methods, Commerce, Economics, 
Statistics, Government and Geogr aphy. Islamic Studies/ 
Christian Religious Studies, Yoruba and History.  
(xl) CHRISTOPHER requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes in 
English Language, Mathematics, Economics, one (1)  
Science subject and any one of Accounting, Business 
Methods, Commerce, Government, Geography or  
Statistics.  
(xli) BELLS require five (5) 'O' Level credits passes at one (1) or 
two (2) sittings which must include English Language, 
Mathematics, Economics and any other two (2) subjects.  
(xlii) PAN-ATLANTIC requires five (5) 'O' level credit p asses 
including English Language, Mathematics/ Economics/ 
Accounting/ Commerce and other relevant subjects.  
(xliii) COAL-CITY requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes including 
English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other 
two (2) relevant subjects.  
(xliv) NDA requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics, Accounting and any two (2) Arts 
and Social Science subjects from Commerce,  
Government, Civic Education, Accounting, Geography, 
History and Economics.  
  
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
(i) CRUTECH and EKSU require Economics, Mathematics, and 
any Social Science subject.  
(ii) BOWEN requires Government for Public Administration.  
(iii) BENIN for Public Administration requires 
Government/History, one (1) Social Science subject and any 
other subject.
